decks.name: Rendering in React
decks.description: React's component structure allows for quickly building a complex web application that relies on DOM manipulation.

decks.name: React Router
decks.description: React Router is a collection of navigational components that compose declaratively with your application.

cards.front: How do you modify the state of a different React component?
cards.back: Not at all! State is visible to the component only.
